page.title: 12ECOLOGY PLANT SURVEY
page.content: 7 Common plants were selected for a random survey using quadrats.The scores obtained were converted to the DAFOR scale(Dominant,Abundant,Frequent ,Occasional,Rare) {1.}Buttercup{2.}camomile{3.}Clover {4.}Daisy{5.}Dandelion{6.}Moss {7.}Plantain.
